## 1. Set Up

```{r}
library(pacman)

p_load(tidyverse, sf, spData)

```


## 2. Data

```{r}

data("world")
data("worldbank_df")

```


## 3. Assignment

### 3.1 Examine the data

```{r}
glimpse(world)

class(world)

glimpse(worldbank_df)

class(worldbank_df)

```

> world has multipolygon data and two different subclasses of dataframes. worldbank doesn't have any spatial data.

Combine dataframes

```{r}

worldwide <- left_join(world, worldbank_df, by = c("iso_a2"))

glimpse(worldwide)

```

> The resulting dataframe looks reasonable to me. All the data I expected to be there is.
